ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 196
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don;t know about that.  With a 3D sound card, that creaking sound comes from behind me and down the corridor, not from the lantern in front of me.
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:18 AM 1/10/00 +1300, you wrote:
>From: jbuckingham@...
>
>
>> I have seen the lamp you are talking about. Never found out what it was
>triggering. It was
>> mentioned a few months ago on this list when we were still looking
>desperately for the 3rd
>>book/fishing pole recipe. I don't remember anyone coming up with an answer
>about it.
>
>It's not triggering anything, the creaking sound is merely the lantern
>itself revolving, not some hidden door.
>
I don;t know about that. With a 3D sound card, that creaking sound comes
from behind me and down the corridor, not from the lantern in front of me.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'anon (Bertoxx)
Archmage of The House of Silmindo
